title: Suggestion
description: This schema defines the Suggestion entity. A suggestion can be applied to an asset to give the owner context about possible changes or improvements to descriptions, tags,...

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies an entity instance.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

entityLink.description: Data asset about which this thread is created for with format <#E::{entities}::{entityName}::{field}::{fieldValue}.

createdAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

createdBy.description: User or Bot who made the suggestion.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the update version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

updatedBy.description: User or Bot who updated the suggestion.

description.description: The main message of the thread in Markdown format.
